post:
Looking for a storage VPS. Will be using duplicity to make backups, so ssh access is prefered, but rsync or ftp would also work. 

Requirements:
- Around 60GB of storage, might grow
- RAID not needed
- Location is important, should be NL, DE, BE or FR
- Cost preferably under EUR 7/month
- No root access needed, ssh/rsync will be enough

Any providers willing to make an offer? It will be used and mentioned in a coming article/tutorial about duplicity on https://raymii.org.

btw, I know the storage vps question is asked every week, but this is a direct offer question with clear requirements.
